name: transitional
trans: relating to the process of changing

name: violent
trans: very strong and uncontrolled

name: mechanism
trans: a part of a machine, or a set of parts that work together

name: swing
trans: to change from one condition or attitude to another

name: occupy
trans: to fill, use, or exist in a place or a time

name: sparse
trans: small in number or amount and not dense or close together

name: extreme
trans: very great; beyond what is usual or what might be expected

name: fringe
trans: the outer or less important part of an area, group, or activity

name: diverse
trans: varied or different

name: adapt
trans: to adjust to different conditions or uses, or to change to meet different situations

name: thrive
trans: to grow, develop, or be successful

name: resilient
trans: able to improve quickly after being hurt or being ill

name: stressor
trans: something that causes stress (= great worry or emotional difficulty)

name: minimize
trans: to reduce something to the smallest possible level or amount

name: moisture
trans: very small drops of water, either in the air or on a surface

name: prolific
trans: producing a great number or amount of something

name: evaporation
trans: the process of changing from a liquid to a gas, or a change from a liquid to a gas

name: dilute
trans: to make a liquid weaker by mixing it with water or another liquid

name: determine
trans: to control or influence directly; to decide

name: accumulate
trans: to collect or increase something gradually, esp. over a period of time
